meanings.definition: Not physical; not relating to the body or material things.
meanings.sent1: Her love for music was a nonphysical connection that touched her soul.
meanings.sent2: The idea of happiness is often described as a nonphysical state of mind.
meanings.sent3: The nonphysical concept of time travel in movies always fascinates me.
meanings.sent4: His nonphysical presence in the room felt like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The nonphysical bond between the twins was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Existing without a physical form or presence.
meanings.sent1: The ghostly figure was described as a nonphysical entity by the witnesses.
meanings.sent2: The concept of a soul is often associated with nonphysical existence.
meanings.sent3: The nonphysical shadow on the wall startled the children during the power outage.
meanings.sent4: Her nonphysical voice echoed in his mind long after the phone call ended.
meanings.sent5: The nonphysical energy in the room made the hair on the back of his neck stand up.
